name: NSTrain
0:
”Alexa open n.s. train”
”when is the next train?”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. s. train
des:
With N.S. (Nederlandse Spoorwegen) Train , you can get information about the next train schedules in the Netherlands. You can ask for more detail information about a specific journey.

To start the skill, say:
"Alexa, open N.S. Train info"

To get the next train information, say:
"Alexa, when is the next train?"
"Alexa, when is the next train from Amsterdam?"
"Alexa, when is the next train from Amsterdam to Schiphol?"

Next, you can ask for more information for a journey like:
"How much is the trip?"
"Do I need to switch train?"
"How long is the trip?"

* This skill can support limited numbers of stations in the Netherlands.
